title: fail to compile wgpu on rustc 1.71.0-nightly from bevy 0.10.0 release

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust Not Applicable, as the error arises from an inability to compile wgpu ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ```bash $/home>rustc --version --verbose rustc 1.71.0-nightly (a77c55248 2023-05-06) binary: rustc commit-hash: a77c552485a19245a266bc03c450676c666b605f commit-date: 2023-05-06 host: x86_64-pc-windows-msvc release: 1.71.0-nightly LLVM version: 16.0.2 ``` ### Error output ```bash error: internal compiler error: compiler\rustc_monomorphize\src\collector.rs:1038:9: no MIR available for DefId(26:3010 ~ wgpu_core[7a6f]::track::texture::{impl#0}::all_ordered) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/a77c552485a19245a266bc03c450676c666b605f\compiler\rustc_errors\src\lib.rs:1650:9 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7ffed989636c - ::fmt::h23f1fb14034f4d8e 1: 0x7ffed98cfa0b - core::fmt::write::hfafb50adbc8294ee 2: 0x7ffed988b919 - ::fmt::hded8b0a634ddda67 3: 0x7ffed989611b - std::sys::common::alloc::realloc_fallback::hff2ec9094df8683a 4: 0x7ffed9899939 - std::panicking::default_hook::h07bec551f84a7c22 5: 0x7ffed98995ef - std::panicking::default_hook::h07bec551f84a7c22 6: 0x7ffeacb080a6 - rustc_driver_impl[98d1546219968491]::install_ice_hook 7: 0x7ffed989a03b - std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook::h60c04dabef827e6a 8: 0x7ffeaef8f353 - ::fmt 9: 0x7ffeaef8cdc9 - ::fmt 10: 0x7ffeaef8cd69 - ::fmt 11: 0x7ffeaef85720 - ::fmt 12: 0x7ffeaef852dc - ::fmt 13: 0x7ffeaefbcc2d - rustc_middle[ae3d3bf8b86cb44f]::util::bug::bug_fmt 14: 0x7ffeaefbc1ed - ::find_by_name_and_kinds 15: 0x7ffeaefbc1af - ::find_by_name_and_kinds 16: 0x7ffeaefbcb1f - rustc_middle[ae3d3bf8b86cb44f]::util::bug::bug_fmt 17: 0x7ffeabe1ed6a - ::visit_constant 18: 0x7ffeabe15a8f - ::visit_operand 19: 0x7ffeabe15ea7 - ::visit_operand 20: 0x7ffeabe15ea7 - ::visit_operand 21: 0x7ffeabe15ea7 - ::visit_operand 22: 0x7ffeabe15ea7 - ::visit_operand 23: 0x7ffeabe15ea7 - ::visit_operand 24: 0x7ffeabe15ea7 - ::visit_operand 25: 0x7ffeaaad2689 - ::visit_trait_item 26: 0x7ffeaaad999f - ::merge_codegen_units 27: 0x7ffeaaad5351 - ::merge_codegen_units 28: 0x7ffeaae4072e - rustc_query_impl[601e9256352b9c6c]::plumbing::loadable_from_disk 29: 0x7ffeaad0e766 - rustc_query_impl[601e9256352b9c6c]::query_system_fns 30: 0x7ffeaa37ba70 - ::unchecked_umul 31: 0x7ffeaa35eaa0 - ::codegen_crate 32: 0x7ffeaa33b907 - rustc_interface[29ac7e97af8ed434]::proc_macro_decls::provide 33: 0x7ffeaa333f4a - rustc_interface[29ac7e97af8ed434]::passes::start_codegen 34: 0x7ffeaa335b19 - rustc_interface[29ac7e97af8ed434]::passes::start_codegen 35: 0x7ffeaa323be7 - ::ongoing_codegen 36: 0x7ffeaa2e971a - rustc_driver_impl[98d1546219968491]::args::arg_expand_all 37: 0x7ffeaa30a98b - ::fmt 38: 0x7ffeaa2e8c59 - rustc_driver_impl[98d1546219968491]::main 39: 0x7ffeaa309b76 - ::fmt 40: 0x7ffed98ad21c - std::sys::windows::thread::Thread::new::h8b419408ebd8689c 41: 0x7fff9c34269d - BaseThreadInitThunk 42: 0x7fff9dbaa9f8 - RtlUserThreadStart note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.71.0-nightly (a77c55248 2023-05-06) running on x86_64-pc-windows-msvc note: compiler flags: --crate-type lib -C opt-level=3 -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C debug-assertions=on note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [collect_and_partition_mono_items] collect_and_partition_mono_items end of query stack error: could not compile `wgpu` (lib) warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish... ```
Backtrace

``` ```
